verses.verse: He that dwells <S%H3427><s%> in the secret <S%H5643><s%> place of the most <S%H5945><s%> High <S%H5945><s%> shall abide <S%H3885><s%> under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the Almighty. <S%H7706><s%>
I will say <S%H559><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> He is my refuge <S%H4268><s%> and my fortress: <S%H4686><s%> my God; <S%H430><s%> in him will I trust. <S%H982><s%>
Surely <S%H3588><s%> he shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> you from the snare <S%H6341><s%> of the fowler, <S%H3353><s%> and from the noisome <S%H1942><s%> pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

He shall cover <S%H5526><s%> you with his feathers, <S%H84><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> his wings <S%H3671><s%> shall you trust: <S%H2620><s%> his truth <S%H571><s%> shall be your shield <S%H6793><s%> and buckler. <S%H5507><s%>
You shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> for the terror <S%H6343><s%> by night; <S%H3915><s%> nor for the arrow <S%H2671><s%> that flies <S%H5774><s%> by day; <S%H3119><s%>
Nor for the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> that walks <S%H1980><s%> in darkness; <S%H652><s%> nor for the destruction <S%H6986><s%> that wastes <S%H7736><s%> at noonday. <S%H6672><s%>

A thousand <S%H505><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> at your side, <S%H6654><s%> and ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H7233><s%> at your right <S%H3225><s%> hand; <S%H3225><s%> but it shall not come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> you.
Only <S%H7535><s%> with your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall you behold <S%H5027><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the reward <S%H8011><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> you have made <S%H7760><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which is my refuge, <S%H4268><s%> even the most <S%H5945><s%> High, <S%H5945><s%> your habitation; <S%H4583><s%>
There shall no <S%H3808><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> befall <S%H579><s%> you, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall any plague <S%H5061><s%> come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> your dwelling. <S%H168><s%>
For he shall give his angels <S%H4397><s%> charge <S%H6680><s%> over you, to keep <S%H8104><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your ways. <S%H1870><s%>
They shall bear <S%H5375><s%> you up in their hands, <S%H3709><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you dash <S%H5062><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> against a stone. <S%H68><s%>

You shall tread <S%H1869><s%> on the lion <S%H7826><s%> and adder: <S%H6620><s%> the young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H3715><s%> and the dragon <S%H8577><s%> shall you trample <S%H7429><s%> under feet. <S%H6471><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> he has set his love <S%H2836><s%> on me, therefore will I deliver <S%H6403><s%> him: I will set him on high, <S%H7682><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has known <S%H3045><s%> my name. <S%H8034><s%>
He shall call <S%H7121><s%> on me, and I will answer <S%H6030><s%> him: I will be with him in trouble; <S%H6869><s%> I will deliver <S%H2502><s%> him, and honor <S%H3519><s%> him.
With long <S%H753><s%> life <S%H3117><s%> will I satisfy <S%H7646><s%> him, and show <S%H7200><s%> him my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
